title: Shoujo☆Kageki Revue Starlight Movie
synopsis: Starlight - it's a distant star, long ago, and in the far future. Two girls, who were struck by the light of the stage in this play, exchanged their destinies.
related_anime: ['Shoujo☆Kageki Revue Starlight', 'Shoujo☆Kageki Revue Starlight: Rondo Rondo Rondo']
